select
distinct
from yo_userinfosalary
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from yo_userinfosalary
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%' )
and salarydate like CONCAT('%','${salarydate}','%' )
